pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Weighted Quantile Sum Regression Random Subset // Fits Weighted Quantile Sum Random Subset (WQSRS) regressions for continuous, binomial, multinomial and count outcomes. Paul Curtin, Joshua Kellogg, Nadja Cech, Chris Gennings (2019) doi:10.1080/03610918.2019.1577971.
